articles.title: What Analysts Think Is Changing The Story For loanDepot Now
articles.mainIdea: What Analysts Think Is Changing The Story For loanDepot Now
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: What Analysts Think Is Changing The Story For loanDepot Now. loanDepot’s latest price target revision has drawn fresh attention to how investors are recalibrating expectations around the lender’s future. While the fair value estimate and core assumptions like discount rate and revenue growth remain largely intact, the higher target reflects a delicate balance between optimism on execution and lingering doubts about long term momentum. Read on to see how you can track these shifting expectations over time and stay ahead of the evolving... Related tickers mentioned: LDI.

articles.summary: Zacks: Citigroup Seizes Japan's M&A Boom, Plans to Expand IB Team. C ramps up Japan investment banking, planning a 30% headcount boost by 2026 as a record M&A boom reshapes the corporate landscape. Related tickers mentioned: BLK, C.

articles.summary: Financial Times: Big US banks add $600bn in value as deregulation spurs gains. America’s six largest banks added $600bn in market value in 2025, spurred on by the Trump administration’s push to deregulate the industry and... Related tickers mentioned: BAC, JPM.
